name: Boneyard
description: Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 3470 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.  Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.  An ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing 3375 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing for the damage done.
coefDescription: Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing $1 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.  Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.  An ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing $2 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing for the damage done.
